about.title: Operator Origin
about.paragraph: I started in fine dining, where survival meant collaboration, precision, and adaptability. Those values shaped my approach in tech — first in value‑based discovery and negotiation, then in building systems that surface real customer signals and scale insights across teams.
bullets: Turning customer data into proactive growth strategies
Building systems that turn customer signals into scalable action
Translating insights into measurable revenue impact

trackRecord.description: Series A/B scaling, automation design, retention systems.

automations.title: RevOps & CS Automations
items: 200+ weekly hours saved via contract‑to‑cash automations.
8x increase in committed customers; +18% NRR (+$1.62M ARR).

occupancy.title: Occupancy‑Based & Personal Automations
items: Hands‑free daily briefing sequence via IoT & automation server.

testimonials.name: Rahat Rahman
testimonials.title: Senior Strategy Manager
testimonials.quote: Andrew brought clarity to complex change management—owning handoffs, dashboards, and process templates that simplified the work and raised the bar.

testimonials.name: Natalia Wyatt
testimonials.title: Billing Operations Manager
testimonials.quote: He bridges customer needs with operational rigor. The billing workflow improvements boosted productivity across teams.

testimonials.name: Allie Guertin
testimonials.title: Senior Manager, Customer Success
testimonials.quote: Analytical and impact‑driven. Andrew’s reporting and approach influence not just CSMs—leaders learn from him too.

testimonials.name: Junya Kato
testimonials.title: Collections Manager
testimonials.quote: Proactive and relentlessly improvement‑minded. His work reduced unnecessary effort and empowered partner teams.

testimonials.name: Rob Allen Jr
testimonials.title: Principal Customer Success Manager
testimonials.quote: A mentor who creates space to grow. His guidance built confidence and accelerated my development.

testimonials.name: Jina Algarin
testimonials.title: Director of Business Operations
testimonials.quote: Technical acumen + genuine customer care. A culture builder who quickly becomes the go‑to resource.

testimonials.name: Omkar Waghe
testimonials.title: Customer Success Engineer
testimonials.quote: Built a high‑trust, high‑performing team and broke down information silos with scalable process and enablement.
